metadata.title: CVE-2022-24577 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
GPAC 1.0.1 is affected by a NULL pointer dereference in gf_utf8_wcslen.(gf_utf8_wcslen is a renamed Unicode utf8_wcslen function.)

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-24577` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gpac - 2.0.0+dfsg1-2build1
gpac-modules-base - 2.0.0+dfsg1-2build1
libgpac12 - 2.0.0+dfsg1-2build1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: gpac package in noble, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.0.0+dfsg1-2build1').
